title: Iranian filmmaker urges Tehran: Let banned director go to Cannes
text:
Iranian filmmaker urges Tehran: Let banned director go to Cannes 1:28pm EDT - 01:56
Double-Oscar winning filmmaker Asghar Farhadi has made a last-minute plea to Iran to let a fellow Iranian director Jafar Panahi, who is officially banned from working and travelling, to come to the premiere of his own film. narration).
